content: decrease row using col a ch3 ch1 56 cut the yarn approx 15cm/6 from sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 the last stitch pull on the loop on sk1 h repeat the section inside the your crochet hook until the end pops stars a further 19 20 22 24 times through - you have now secured the dc1 into the next double_crochet st skip the chain last stitch from the beginning of the row below turn your work 43 45 49 53 sts 6 decrease row using col b ch3 sk1 right sleeve hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside the 1 repeat steps 1 to 32 as for the left stars a further 19 20 22 24 times sleeve dc1 into the 3rd chain from the beginning of the row below turn your 2 decrease row using col e and with the work 42 44 48 52 sts right side of your work facing you insert your crochet hook into the 2nd 7 decrease row using col b ch3 ch1 double_crochet st from your previous round not sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 counting the ch3 at the beginning of sk1 h repeat the section inside the the round and pull through a loop stars a further 18 19 21 23 times ch3 sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st dc1 into the next double_crochet st skip the chain ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside from the beginning of the row below the stars a further 21 22 24 26 turn your work 41 43 47 51 sts times dc1 into the next double_crochet st turn your work 46 48 52 56 sts 8 decrease row using col c ch3 sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 3 decrease row using col e ch3 ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside the 20 #woolandthegang eng stars a further 18 19 21 23 times the beginning of the row below turn dc1 into the 3rd chain from the your work 35 37 41 45 sts beginning of the row below turn your work 40 42 46 50 sts 14 decrease row using col a ch3 sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 9 decrease row using col c ch3 ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside the sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 stars a further 15 16 18 20 times sk1 h repeat the section inside the dc1 into the 3rd chain from the stars a further 17 18 20 22 times beginning of the row below turn your dc1 into the next double_crochet st skip the chain work 34 36 40 44 sts from the beginning of the row below turn your work 39 41 45 49 sts 15 decrease row using col a ch3 ch1 sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 10 decrease row using col d ch3 sk1 sk1 h repeat the section inside the hdc1 into the next
